CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function 'unique_name_126' is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) because it directly appends a node to a fragment without sanitizing the input. An attacker can potentially inject malicious scripts through the 'node' parameter, which will then be executed when the fragment is rendered.
